item.title: Discussing the State of Digital Quality in 2023
item.showcaseBlurb: This year’s State of Digital Quality report provides a snapshot of the most common flaws, coverage, and testing challenges and introduces a series of frameworks gleaned from Applause’s years of experience working with global technology leaders and innovators. Join our panel to learn what sets these organizations apart when it comes to creating excellence in digital experiences.

item.title: How Vodafone Shifted User Acceptance Testing Left
item.showcaseBlurb: In order to release faster and deliver greater value to customers, Vodafone shifted User Acceptance Testing (UAT) left. By moving from Waterfall to Agile, Vodafone did away with documentation- and process-heavy operations. In this webinar, we speak to Vodafone's UAT Lead about how they built an Agile UAT practice that places real users at the center of testing efforts.

item.title: ​Onboarding A Crowdtesting Partner
item.showcaseBlurb: On Wednesday, December 7 at 1 PM ET/10 AM PT, Applause CTO Rob Mason shares best practices for bringing a crowdtesting provider into your software testing ecosystem. Explore how to choose a pilot project, scope the pilot, set goals, measure success and gain value from the relationship. Register today to get answers for all your questions about how to get started with crowdtesting.

item.title: The Essential Guide to Crowdtesting
item.showcaseBlurb: Get the facts about crowdsourced software testing. In this guide, you'll learn how leading brands across industries deliver better quality releases, at speed and scale.

item.title: Sam's Club Discusses Its Inclusive Design Journey
item.showcaseBlurb: Many organizations struggle to implement the vision of a world-class inclusivity program. Learn how Sam’s Club team made iterative changes to provide the momentum, the evidence and the empathy to make broader changes across the organization.

item.title: Perfect App Personalization Step by Step
item.showcaseBlurb: Large corporations face an extremely difficult task delivering personalized experiences for their customers. But, while challenging, it's a necessary effort that improves customer satisfaction and retention. Learn how some of the world's leading brands approach the task, step by step up the pyramid of personalization.

item.title: Accessibility Now Means Less Pain Later
item.showcaseBlurb: Accessibility planning is key to short and long-term enterprise success. Learn the common accessibility hurdles for enterprise from real-life enterprise example and how to overcome them. Find out how inclusively designed accessibility projects help everyone, not just persons with disabilities. The European Accessibility Act and it's impact on global business is covered as well.

item.title: The State of Digital Quality in 2022
item.showcaseBlurb: Join our webinar on May 19 at 1 PM ET / 10 AM PT to learn the most common barriers to delivering digital experiences that customers love. Review the results from comprehensive analysis of test data across data across 159 countries, 70+ industries, and multiple testing categories to get concrete steps your organization can take to improve digital quality.

item.title: Localization Testing in the Real World
item.showcaseBlurb: Localization testing is an incredibly important, and incredibly nuanced, strategy — it’s no simple matter of translating languages and pushing the deploy button. What seems sensible in one culture might be confusing or even offensive to another. In this webinar, our panel of experts discuss strategies and examples to boost the odds of a successful launch.

item.title: Ensuring an Effective Onboarding Experience: Test for Customer Success
item.showcaseBlurb: Ensure customer loyalty by delivering an exceptional first experience. Watch the on-demand webinar with Carlton Retland, Applause Principal Solutions Engineer, as he discusses how you can optimize your new customer onboarding process.

item.title: Implement Best Practices to Build Better Conversational Assistants
item.showcaseBlurb: This January 12 at 10 am PT/ 1 pm ET join Ben Anderson and Inge De Bleecker for a discussion around today’s key success factors and best practices for launching AI conversational assistants. They’ll cover key AI considerations such as training your AI on quality data; testing across the full array of devices; testing outside the lab; eliminating biases in AI and building a feedback loop.

item.title: Best Practices for Test Case Management
item.showcaseBlurb: There are many test case management challenges for software development organizations. Heightened quality standards, the shift from Waterfall to Agile, and the ever-increasing pressure to deliver products faster all contribute to the mix. Read our ebook for more insights.

item.title: Dreem Case Study
item.showcaseBlurb: Learn how Dreem saw an exponential improvement in testing capabilities and significantly saved time and resources for their QA teams.

item.title: How to Create an End-to-End Payment Testing Plan
item.showcaseBlurb: With multiple connection points for every payment transaction involving different hardware, payment instruments, apps and processors, a lot can go wrong. Crowdtesting allows you to ensure payments work seamlessly for your customers — and your company. In this webinar, we’ll discuss important quality and testing considerations for different parts of the payment ecosystem.

item.title: Swisscom Case Study
item.showcaseBlurb: Learn how Swisscom, a major Swiss telecommunications provider, partners with Applause to test their platform’s functionality, UI, streaming quality and security.

item.title: Greentube Case Study
item.showcaseBlurb: Learn how Applause helped Greentube improve its online casino games in multiple countries with real-world testing.

item.title: Test Automation: Your Questions Answered
item.showcaseBlurb: What is test automation, and what does it mean for your organization? Learn about trends in test automation with Applause expert Jonathan Zaleski in this Q&A.

item.title: Building Data Driven Organizations And Feedback Loops
item.showcaseBlurb: This October 13th at 5:30 CET Smallpdf CPO, Mike Pilawski, joins Applause for a discussion on how product teams can gain actionable information to build better feedback loops.

item.title: Banner Health Case Study
item.showcaseBlurb: Learn how Applause helps Banner Health better understand the digital healthcare needs of its patients and providers and identify unexpected issues.

item.title: Digital Healthcare Panel: Exploring the Digital Opportunities and Obstacles for Providers
item.showcaseBlurb: Join our webinar panel this August 19th at 10 am PT/ 1 pm ET as digital healthcare experts examine strategies for delivering better digital experiences for healthcare providers and patients.

item.title: Key Takeaways for Using Codeless Test Automation
item.showcaseBlurb:
Codeless test automation is on the rise, and many organizations plan to purchase solutions that help them automate simple test cases without code.
In this webinar, Cathy Huang, Product Director at Applause, details how codeless automation should fit into teams’ testing strategies and how it differs from scripted test automation. She also demos Applause Codeless Automation for mobile applications.

item.title: Overcome Three Barriers to Effective Test Automation
item.showcaseBlurb: It takes unique skills, and an immense amount of time and resources to scale test automation, but the results are well worth it. Codeless Automation from Applause is here to help.

item.title: Best Practices For a Repeatable Shift-Left Commitment
item.showcaseBlurb: How can companies ensure the in-sprint testing process is done right? Join Applause testing experts Mike Plachta and Michael McKethan on May 13th, 10 a.m PT/1 p.m ET as they discuss the challenges of shifting left and innovative ways to rapidly validate new code.

item.title: How Expensify Achieves High-Quality Daily Releases
item.showcaseBlurb: The pace of fast software releases and updates often puts a strain on quality. This March 16 at 10 a.m PT/ 1 p.m EST Expensify’s Director of Engineering, Tim Golen, and Shai Simchi, Applause Solution Delivery Manager at Applause, discuss how Expensify increased release velocity without losing quality.

item.title: Delivering Excellent Digital Quality to Customers
item.showcaseSubtitle: Upcoming webinar Wednesday, December 9 at 1 p.m. ET/10 a.m. PT
item.showcaseBlurb: Customers demand a flawless digital experience on every platform they use today. But how do organizations that provide flawless digital experiences get there, and what makes their processes unique? In this webinar, Applause hosts a panel with product and engineering leaders at Expensify, Paysafe and PBS to learn how each organization approaches digital quality and how they leverage Applause to get the real-world testing they need.

item.title: QAs Strategic Role in DevOps
item.showcaseBlurb: The very name of “DevOps” calls out developers and operations. But where does QA fit into that mix? Join our webinar January 28 featuring Applause Solutions Consultants Dave Denver and Chris Doucet as they discuss strategies of how to involve QA into your DevOps methodology and make them a strategic partner.

item.title: Overcoming Localized Payment Complexities
item.showcaseBlurb: Ensuring that payments process in every market gets more challenging every year, what with localization, VATs and new payment methods. Digital River has mastered the ins and outs of global commerce, and in this webinar, hear from Jeremy Waxman, Digital River's Head of Payments Strategy, and Zeb Winzenried, Applause’s Senior Manager of Testing Services, on how businesses can implement payment processes to ensure payments process successfully in specific markets.

item.title: Western Union Case Study
item.showcaseBlurb: Discover how Western Union digitized its global payments network with Applause’s help.

item.title: Beskpoken Webinar
item.showcaseBlurb: Voice interfaces are changing the rules of when and how consumers interact with brands. As a new and evolving field, making voice a valuable part of a customer's experience is no easy task for organizations. In this webinar, Applause and Bespoken, will discuss the essentials for building five-star Alexa voice experiences.

item.title: Bespoken Whitepaper
item.showcaseBlurb: Voice is emerging as the next frontier in the hyper-dynamic world of digital. By 2023, 90% of all smartphones will have access to voice-enabled virtual assistants. Given the high stakes, quality of voice is critical. In this whitepaper, Applause and Bespoken, highlight best practices for testing voice and the key strategies you need to succeed with voice.

item.title: Oomnitza Case Study
item.showcaseBlurb: See how IT asset management company Oomnitza drastically reduced its number of reported security issues by partnering with Applause.

item.title: Uber Case Study
item.showcaseBlurb: Learn how Uber ensures a great experience for every customer by testing beyond “the happy path” in the real world across hundreds of cities across the globe.

item.title: Dignity Health Case Study
item.showcaseBlurb: See how Applause integrates into the Dignity Health team and helps the healthcare company speed release velocity and improve test coverage.

item.title: Master Lock Case Study
item.showcaseBlurb: See how Master Lock evolved its products in the digital age with Applause ensuring its IoT-enabled smart locks met customer expectations across the globe.

item.title: Dow Jones Case Study
item.showcaseBlurb: Discover how Dow Jones partners with Applause to uncover critical bugs, increase release velocity and provide an improved customer experience.

item.title: Étude de cas
item.showcaseBlurb: Découvrez comment Western Union, le leader des paiements internationaux et multi-devises, a numérisé son réseau de paiement international rapidement et en toute sécurité grâce à Applause

item.title: Shake Shack Case Study
item.showcaseBlurb: Learn how Shake Shack successfully launched its first mobile order-ahead experience by assessing and stress testing its app and in-store operations with Applause.

item.title: Fox Case Study
item.showcaseBlurb: Learn how FOX cut its number of critical defects in half while reducing its release cycle time by 25% with automated testing from Applause.

item.title: UCSF Case Study
item.showcaseBlurb: Learn how one of the nations top biomedical research universities, UCSF, employs crowdtesting techniques to ensure its immersive memory evaluation experience is usable by all groups and demographics within the population.
